children.value: Always save 5/gal with Gold Status at Shell

cases.condition: |~ ((System.now FORMAT_TIMESTAMP >= MemberAttributesData.derivedData.tiers.1P_SMITTYSCR.nextStatus.evalStartDate FORMAT_TIMESTAMP && System.now FORMAT_TIMESTAMP <= MemberAttributesData.derivedData.tiers.1P_SMITTYSCR.nextStatus.evalEndDate FORMAT_TIMESTAMP) && (MemberAttributesData.derivedData.tiers.1P_SMITTYSCR.status == 'GOLD') && (MemberAttributesData.derivedData.tiers.1P_SMITTYSCR.nextStatus.purchaseBalance COUNT < 1 || MemberAttributesData.derivedData.tiers.1P_SMITTYSCR.nextStatus.purchaseBalance == 0)) ~|

children.name: StatusDescription
children.value: You're saving an extra 5/gal on every fill-up with Gold Status at Shell. Fill up 6 times every three months to keep Gold Status.

children.name: SavingsDescription
children.value: Your available rewards at Smitty's locations without Shell Fuel

children.name: ShellSavingsDescription
children.value: Your available rewards at Smitty's locations with Shell fuel (Includes Fuel Rewards balance)

children.name: Disclaimer
children.value:
Your available rewards at the pump 
may vary by location.

children.name: Body1
children.value: Thank you for your loyalty! You will save at least 5/gal at participating Shell stations.

staticParameters.tierBulletText: Save at least 5/gal, up to 20 gallons, at participating Shell stations.
Stack with rewards earned from everyday purchases.
Gain access to other exclusive savings and offers.
You must fill up 6 times during your 90 day qualification period to maintain Gold Status.
Members who do not qualify for Gold Status will receive Silver Status.
Members with Silver Status save at least 3/gal at participating Shell stations.

children.name: DisclaimerText
children.value: Restrictions apply. Limit 20 gallons, per purchase, per vehicle at participating Shell stations.

children.name: Body1
children.value: Complete 6 qualifying fill-ups of at least 5 gallons within 3 months to reach Gold Status.

staticParameters.tierBulletText: Save at least 3/gal, up to 20 gallons, at participating Shell stations.
Stack with rewards earned from everyday purchases.
Gain access to other exclusive savings and offers.
Complete 6 qualifying fill-ups of at least 5 gallons within 3 months to reach Gold status and begin saving 5/gal on every fill.
You will keep your Gold Status for the remainder of your qualification period, as well as the next 3-month period.
Check the homepage of the Fuel Rewards website or download the Fuel Rewards app to determine when your qualification period ends and track your progress towards regaining Gold Status.

children.name: DisclaimerText
children.value: Restrictions apply. Limit 20 gallons, per purchase, per vehicle at participating Shell stations.

children.name: Content
children.value: Your Alt ID can be entered at the pump or in the store to earn or redeem rewards. You can manage your Alt ID by updating your phone number in the Profile section of the More tab.

children.name: Content
children.value: Your Alt ID can be entered at the pump or in the store to earn or redeem rewards. You can manage your Alt ID by updating your phone number in the Profile section of the More tab.

children.name: AlertText
children.value: Once you tap 'Confirm', the reward will be redeemed and added to your account.

children.value: Please wait, we are processing your request.

children.name: caseSubmitResultTypeErrorValue
children.value: There was a problem. Please try again or call us.
Password (must have 1 upper, 1 lower, 1 special character, 1 number, and be a minimum 8 digits)

Your password must be 8-16 characters long and include 3 of the following items:

1 lowercase letter (a-z)
1 uppercase letter (A-Z)
1 number (0-9)
1 special character (!@#$%^&*)
You don't meet the verification requirements for this category.
Pump number does not exist. Please enter a valid pump number.
Mobile payment is not supported at this store. Please use a different payment method.
Pump is already in use. Please wait and try again.
We encountered an unexpected error. Please try again later.
